questions.question: What is the unit for momentum?

choices.answer: g m/s
kg m/s^2
g m/s^2
kg m/s

questions.question: When you rearrange the formula of momentum, how do you find velocity?

choices.answer: p=m*v
m=p/v
v=p/m
m/s=kgm/s / kg

questions.question: What is the conservation of momentum?

choices.answer: Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transferred.
Closed system: total momentum before event is the same after
No external forces act on the momentum before=momentum after
Forces act on the total momentum before and after an event.
…the object stops faster.
…the mass increases.
…the velocity increases.
…the mass and velocity decreases.
Kinetic energy before a collision is less than after.
Kinetic energy after a collision increases.
Kinetic energy before collision is equal to after.
Kinetic energy after collision decreases.

questions.question: A change in momentum occurs when…

choices.answer: …some of the energy is transferred into another form.
…a force acts on an object.
…no force acts on an objects.
…part of the kinetic energy is lost.
…a faster change of momentum so a smaller acceleration.
…a slower change of momentum so a greater acceleration.
…a slower change of momentum so a smaller acceleration.
…a faster change of momentum so a greater acceleration.

questions.question: If someone's momentum changes very quickly…

choices.answer: …they are more likely to get injured.
…the forces on the body will be very large.
…more likely to be safe.
…the forces on the body will be very small.

questions.question: Some car safety features slow people down over a longer time. What does this do to their force?

choices.answer: The longer it takes for change in momentum=larger the force
The shorter it takes for change in momentum=larger the force
The longer it takes for change in momentum=smaller the force
Theshorter it takes for change in momentum=smaller the force

questions.question: A gun's momentum before shooting is 0, the gun moves backwards after shooting. Why?

choices.answer: A science fairy makes the shooter lose control of the gun.
The conservation of momentum.
Total momentum before is 0 so after must still be 0.
Conservation of energy.
